subtitle: A classic recipe using fresh tomatoes. Use really ripe tomtoes with lots of flavour.

method.text: Put the vegetables into the boiling stock with the bouquet garni. Simmer for 20-30 min until vegetables are tender. Remove the bouquet garni.
Blend the soup to a puree - or sieve until very smooth. Season to taste.
In a clean pan, add the cream and bring to the boil. Gradually add the soup to heat through.
Serve with a sprinkling of chopped basil.

title: Cream of tomato soup
